infos.value: If it isn't Lord Mont...!
Our mission is complete. Fennes's fortress has been seized.
...Oh! Then we shall report to King Khury at once!
That won't be necessary... Our soldiers have been run ragged.
But...
The sun has set. I will report to him myself on the morrow.
As you wish, Lord.
Then we shall retire to our rooms for the night.
...I see. Lady Machérie has been imprisoned within Leonis Castle...
And so you wish to return, I take it?
...Yes.
Are you certain?
Have you no desire to save her, Schuzelt?

I want nothing more than to rush to her side.
Alas...
To do so would be an act of treachery against Wezette.
If Khury were to catch wind of this, Leonis's favor with Wezette would—
I agree with Mont.
Father...
Wezette and Hourne...
Kings, militaries, domains... There is no need to compare the two.
Besides, King Khury has already betrayed us.
«Equito» was sent to end our lives under his command.
I suppose that is...true.
However, there is still one thing that troubles me.
Is King Khury aware that Glaciela is plotting a rebellion in collusion with «Rubeus»?
That, I do not know. But considering what we know about him, it is possible.
What he fears is us allying with Glaciela.
And as such, there is little doubt our every move is being watched.
Then...
Right. We should leave here at once.
Schuzelt... How fare your wounds?
More or less healed, Your Highness.
Then let us make haste.
Very well.
